类 Link

java.lang.Object
Link
public class Link extends Object
This class represents a link between two nodes in the map.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    Node
    a
    First node
    Node
    b
    Second node
    static int
    INPATH
    Link is shown as red in the map (is in the found path).
    static int
    NONE
    Link is shown as black in map (not visited).
    int
    visibility
    Determines how the link is shown in the map GUI.
    static int
    VISITED
    Link is shown blue in the map (node is visited).

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Link​(Node a, Node b)
    Creates a new link.

  • 方法概要

    说明

    Used by the GUI only.

  • 字段详细资料

    • a

      public Node a
      First node

    • b

      public Node b
      Second node

    • NONE

      public static int NONE
      Link is shown as black in map (not visited). This is default.

    • VISITED

      public static int VISITED
      Link is shown blue in the map (node is visited).

    • INPATH

      public static int INPATH
      Link is shown as red in the map (is in the found path).

    • visibility

      public int visibility
      Determines how the link is shown in the map GUI.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Link

      public Link​(Node a, Node b)
      Creates a new link.
      参数:
      a - First node
      b - Second node

  • 方法详细资料

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Link l)
      Checks if this link equals another link by comparing the two nodes connected by the link.
      参数:
      l - The other link to compare with
      返回:
      True if the links are equal, false otherwise

    • getLabel

      public String getLabel()
      Returns the label for this link. A link is labelled with the label of both nodes separated by -.
      返回:
      The label for this link

    • getDrawX1

      public int getDrawX1()
      Used by the GUI only.
      返回:
      draw coordinate

    • getDrawX2

      public int getDrawX2()
      Used by the GUI only.
      返回:
      draw coordinate

    • getDrawY1

      public int getDrawY1()
      Used by the GUI only.
      返回:
      draw coordinate

    • getDrawY2

      public int getDrawY2()
      Used by the GUI only.
      返回:
      draw coordinate
